name: ABN_ORDER_INFO
description: This table contains additional information about the order linked to the Advanced Beneficiary Notice (ABN).

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note (HNO) record that contains the Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) information.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORD_PERF_CSN
columns.description: Stores the contact serial number (CSN) for the contact where the order is expected to be performed.
